channel.title: Applicant background check before hire on EveryCheck

item.title: The EveryCheck solution is essential to validate the honesty of the people we recruit.
item.description:
I work as a Recruitment Manager at Fraikin.

EveryCheck services are essential to us in order to validate the honesty of the people we recruit.

Their services ensure that the accuracy of the information provided is checked, quality references are taken and a clear and concise report is delivered quickly.

This represents for our teams a considerable amount of time saved and greater reliability in our recruitments.

Elwira JAKUBOWSKA
Group Recruitment Manager
Fraikin

item.title: EveryCheck's services provide real support to our recruitment teams.
item.description:
EveryCheck’s services provide real support to our recruitment teams.

As a player in the healthcare sector, we have to comply with regulatory constraints that EverCheck helps us overcome quickly and efficiently.

Very agile and easy to use, this solution gives us more peace of mind in our choices.

Manaf El Hebil
Operations Director
Groupe Domino Int√©rim

item.title: After a trial period, we implemented the solution on a long term basis
item.description:
Working with EveryCheck is for us and our clients a guarantee of quality in our selection process.

The team is very responsive, the platform is easy to use and we gain efficiency and credibility in our recruitments.

item.title: We have noticed a significant improvement in our placement rate
item.description:
I am an Associate Director in the legal division of Neithwork and we have chosen to subscribe to EveryCheck services in order to stand out from our clients by offering them qualified candidates.

Thanks to EveryCheck we have gained credibility with our customers. We have noticed a marked improvement in our placement rate!

Germine Haridy
Associated Director - Legal department
Neithwork

item.title: Our recruitment team gains time and security
item.description: Deploying EveryCheck’s solution ensures a standardized audit and saves time for our recruiting teams.

item.title: A solution integrated to your business
item.description:
Recruiter side: üë®üíº A simple email is all it takes

With a simple and efficient platform, manage all aspects of your audits: track the process, access detailed audit trails and view summary reports on individual candidates.

Candidate side: üôã A simple but comprehensive process

The process on the candidate side is very light. After signing the online authorization, the candidate is asked to fill out a short form so that we can begin our search. We ask the candidate to confirm their identity and the information we have on the experience and degrees to be verified such as dates and job titles or degrees.

item.title: Responsabilidad social de las empresas
item.description:
El compromiso de EveryCheck

La responsabilidad social de las empresas representa los compromisos de las empresas en torno al desarrollo sostenible medioambiental, social y econ√≥mico.

Un informe de RSE es obligatorio para las empresas de m√°s de 500 empleados, pero EveryCheck opt√≥ por comprometerse con 5 valores √©ticos fundamentales:

  1. Aportar siempre m√°s confianza a nuestros clientes.
  • Aspirar a una tasa de satisfacci√≥n del cliente superior al 80%.
  • Facilitar la cooperaci√≥n cruzada entre nuestros equipos y los clientes a trav√©s de reuniones peri√≥dicas
  • Establecer puntos de control
  1. Gestionar √©ticamente los datos personales
  • Todos los colaboradores est√°n formados en gesti√≥n √©tica de datos personales
  • Contamos con un DPO formado entre nuestros colaboradores, licenciado por la UTT
  • EveryCheck tiene una pol√≠tica transparente de seguridad de datos
  1. Cuidamos el bienestar de nuestro equipo
  • Los valores fundamentales de EveryCheck son: fuerte determinaci√≥n, actitud positiva y solidaridad.
  • Momentos sociales para reforzar los lazos entre colaboradores
  • La empresa fomenta las propuestas de los colaboradores y la comunicaci√≥n
  1. Desarrollar nuestro compromiso solidario
  • Mecenazgo de competencias y asociaciones con escuelas sobre la creaci√≥n de CV
  1. Reducir nuestro impacto medioambiental
  • Gesti√≥n de residuos
  • Abastecimiento sostenible
  • Reducci√≥n del uso de energ√≠a

item.title: RGPD y respeto de los datos personales
item.description:
Gracias a una plataforma sencilla y eficaz, podr√° gestionar todos los aspectos de sus auditor√≠as: seguir la evoluci√≥n del proceso, acceder a pistas de auditor√≠a detalladas y consultar informes resumidos sobre los candidatos.

Ninguna verificaci√≥n comienza sin el consentimiento claro y expl√≠cito del propietario de los datos. Los datos recogidos y utilizados, los fines para los que se tratan y el propio tratamiento se explican antes de emprender cualquier acci√≥n.

item.title: Three options to secure your hires
item.description:
Our hiring security solution is based on a factual check of CV information, and can be enhanced with two other options: reference checks with former managers and security checks up to criminal records.

The basic solution: verification of diploma and experience

With the verification of the CV of your future employees, you secure your hiring by checking the authenticity of the diplomas and experiences presented to the recruiter.
